message.entry: Input to ORDEIG must not contain NaN or Inf.
For ORDEIG(A), A must be upper triangular when it is complex.
For ORDEIG(A), A must be block upper triangular with 1-by-1 and 2-by-2 blocks on its diagonal when A is real.
Inputs must be single or double.
Inputs must be the same size.
For ORDEIG(A,B), A and B must be upper triangular when A or B is complex.
For ORDEIG(A,B) when A and B are real, A must be block upper triangular with 1-by-1 and 2-by-2 blocks on its diagonal. In addition, B must be upper triangular.
